column1: Narrator : A tiny raft hits the hull of NOMBATEAU. Its morbidly skinny passenger is desperately calling for help.
PlayerSpeak : I’m not touching that one, let’s go.
OtherSpeak : I’ve been eating nothing but jellyfishes for days, my mouth hurts so much.
OtherSpeak : Take me with you, I beg you!
column3: OtherSpeak : I beg you, spare me!

column2: Choice : Give us everything or we’ll kick your ass(attack)
column4: Choice : Sorry maatey, not enough room on board.

column2: OtherSpeak : Are you blind?! I have NOTHING!
column4: OtherSpeak : Give me at least something to eat! Please!

column6: Choice : No. And remember, don’t drink the sea water, mate!

column5: OtherSpeak : Nothing? I guess that’s it for me then...

column1: Choice : Buddy you’re in luck, we’re off. (leave)
Narrator : The raft is empty. It was on the brink of falling apart.

column2: PlayerSpeak : Unsurprisingly, there's almost nothing to be found.

column3: PlayerSpeak : This one was a reader apparently…
column4: PlayerSpeak : A lantern! How did he even light it?
